abstract.para: The intended readers of this document are developers who want to develop and build social networking features in the Social function of eXo Platform.
The document consists of the following main contents:

listitem.para: Applications: describes applications (portlets and gadgets) included in Social.
Configuration: provides you the comprehensive knowledge about the configuration with a large range of configuration parameters declared in Social.
Developer References: describes about extension, public APIs, Java APIs, tutorials, Social JCR structure, and related others in Social.
